Name: Baikonur Cosmodrome
World achievements: The first satellite  Sputnik 1  was launched.

Name: Ohsumi
World achievements: The smallest satellite launch vehicle (L-4S; 9.4t weight  1.4m diameter)

Name: FSW-0
Asian First: Satellite recovery<ref>返回式卫星 (China's First Atmospheric Reentry Satellite)</ref>

Name:
FSW-0:
– 10m (1975)
FSW-1B:
– 4m (1992)[http://sa.hit.edu.cn/htg/KP/gc_chn/gc_chn_kp_wx04.html Harbin Institute of Technology -> FSW satellite series (Note: the definition of high resolution (ground resolution) < 4.5m)]
Beidou:
– 0.5m (till 2007)[http://orig.news.ifeng.com/mil/2/200707/0718_340_158622.shtml Beidou navigation system first goes to public with resolution 0.5m (from official Xinhua News Agency) with photos]
FB-1
Asian First: Simultaneous satellite launch<ref>中国首次“一箭三星”发射成功 (China's First One-Rocket-Three-Satellite Launch). Science and Technology Daily</ref>

Name: Sakigake
World achievements: The first interplanetary launch by solid rocket (M-3SII)

Name: Yang Liwei
Asian First: First man in space launched by an Asian space program

Name: Hayabusa
World achievements: The first asteroid ascent  sample return from an asteroid

Name: FY-1C
World achievements: Highest in history with altitude 865 km  also the fastest with speed 18k miles

Name: Japanese Experiment Module
Asian First: Manned foundations in space (STS-123  STS-124  STS-127)
World achievements: The world’s largest pressurized volume in space<ref></ref>

Name: Tianlian I
Asian First:
Indigenous Tracking & Data Relay Satellite System
First TDRS system to support manned missions

Name: Moon Impact Probe
World achievements: Discovered water on the Moon before impact.<ref name="Water found"></ref><ref></ref>

Name: IKAROS
World achievements: The first spacecraft to successfully demonstrate solar-sail technology in interplanetary space

Name: Chang'e 2
Asian First: Lunar probe with extended deep space missions (asteroid mission to 4179 Toutatis).

Name: Shenzhou 9
Asian First: First manned space docking by an Asian country (with Tiangong-1)

Name: Chang'e 3/Yutu
Asian First: First lunar soft landing and lunar rover by an Asian country.

Name: Mars Orbiter Mission
Asian First: First successful Mars mission by an Asian country
World achievements: First Martian mission by a country to succeed on the first attempt. Third country to do so after the USSR and the USA.
